snippet.title: Echo: Defy Death - Teaser (UPDATED)
snippet.description:
Showing new content like boss fights, secondary weapons and many more fun surprises! 

A Roguelite RPG about betrayal, revenge, and how much you’re willing to pay to get it. Use echolocation to fight your enemies, make pacts with demons to grow stronger, gather weapons, find the one who stole your eyes, and make them pay!

Steam page - https://store.steampowered.com/app/29...

Wishlist the game to support us and not miss the invite for beta testing!
